C2 a type of work that you feel you are suited to doing and to which you should give all your time and energy, or the feeling that a type of work suits you in this way: I feel I've found/missed my true vocation. Most teachers regard their profession as a vocation, not just a job. To work in medicine, you should have a vocation for it. Synonym
